body:
YO, I'm tagwag!
I'm an avid gamer who's looking for a community that's fun and awesome! Last time I was involved in Minecraft was a while ago with a server called Intoxicated whose community had grown to be well, let's not talk about that xD.
But now I'm here because a good ingame friend that I will not name *cough* Rileguy *cough* insisted on me joining him in this awesome server to play! I hope that I can have a great time here with everyone!
P.S. remember to AMA (or nawwwww)
body_tagged:

title: First Introduction and AMA

replies.body: Welcome to the forums Boi!! Make sure you check out the rules at avicus.net/rules and to check out plug DJ @ plug.dj/avicus. Oh yeah and where do you live?
replies.body_tagged: Welcome to the forums Boi!! Make sure you check out the rules at avicus.net/rules and to check out plug DJ @ plug.dj/avicus. Oh yeah and where do you live?

replies.body:
SUP RileGuy, long time no see (jk m8)
I'm not getting specific as to where I live because I don't want any creeps tryna find me, but since you asked I will give a big hint....
Now pay attention here....
You listening?


 >_>
<_<

It's in The United States.... *GASP* :OOOOO





Now I was very generous with that hint right there and I am NOT giving any more hints as to where I live!
And aight I shall check dem rules!

replies.body:
Thanks!
I'm a Sheep because I think sheep are actually sneaky little buggers who nobody would suspect to be smart, and the sunglasses are to make me look like I work for the FBI.
*In a crappy Russian accent* Tis good business when working with sheep
